类 com.avos.avoscloud.AVCallback
的使用

  • 使用AVCallback的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.avos.avoscloud  
    com.avos.avoscloud.im.v2.callback  

    • com.avos.avoscloud中AVCallback的使用

      com.avos.avoscloud中AVCallback的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AVMobilePhoneVerifyCallback 
      class  CloudQueryCallback<T extends AVCloudQueryResult>
      CloudQueryCallback 是通过AVQuery直接调用cloudQuery查询之后被调用的回调函数
      class  CountCallback
      A CountCallback is used to run code after a AVQuery is used to count objects matching a query in a background thread.
      class  DeleteCallback
      A DeleteCallback is used to run code after saving a AVObject in a background thread.
      class  FindCallback<T extends AVObject>
      A FindCallback is used to run code after a AVQuery is used to fetch a list of AVObjects in a background thread.
      class  FollowCallback<T extends AVObject>
      Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
      class  FollowersAndFolloweesCallback<T extends AVObject>
      Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
      class  FunctionCallback<T>
      A FunctionCallback is used to run code after AVCloud.callFunction(java.lang.String, java.util.Map) is used to run a Cloud Function in a background thread.
      class  GetCallback<T extends AVObject>
      A GetCallback is used to run code after a AVQuery is used to fetch a AVObject in a background thread.
      class  GetDataCallback
      A GetDataCallback is used to run code after a AVFile fetches its data on a background thread.
      class  GetFileCallback<T extends AVFile>
      A GetFileCallback is used to run code after a AVFile.parseFileWithObjectId is used to fetch a AVFile by object id in a background thread.
      class  GroupMemberQueryCallback
      查询实时通信群组的群用户列表的回调类
      class  InboxStatusFindCallback
      本类是用于Status中的收件箱查询 增加了一个end属性，来判断是否查询到最老的一页数据
      class  LogInCallback<T extends AVUser>
      A LogInCallback is used to run code after logging in a user.
      class  ProgressCallback
      A ProgressCallback is used to get progress of an operation.
      class  RefreshCallback<T extends AVObject>
      A RefreshCallback is used to run code after refresh is used to update a AVObject in a background thread.
      class  RequestEmailVerifyCallback
      RequestEmailVerifyCallback 用来验证用户的邮箱.
      class  RequestMobileCodeCallback
      RequestMobilePhoneVerify 用来验证用户的手机号码 　调用的范例如下 AVUser.requestMobilePhoneVerifyInBackgroud("12345678901", new RequestMobileCodeCallback() { public void done(AVException e) { if (e == null) { requestedSuccessfully(); } else { requestDidNotSucceed(); } } });
      class  RequestPasswordResetCallback
      A RequestPasswordResetCallback is used to run code requesting a password reset for a user.
      class  SaveCallback
      A SaveCallback is used to run code after saving a AVObject in a background thread.
      class  SendCallback
      A SendCallback is used to run code after sending a AVPush in a background thread.
      class  SignUpCallback
      A SignUpCallback is used to run code after signing up a AVUser in a background thread.
      class  StatusCallback
      Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
      class  StatusListCallback
      Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
      class  UpdatePasswordCallback
      这个方法是在针对一个已经登陆用户修改密码请求

    • com.avos.avoscloud.im.v2.callback中AVCallback的使用

      com.avos.avoscloud.im.v2.callback中AVCallback的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AVIMClientCallback
      Created by lbt05 on 3/19/15.
      class  AVIMClientStatusCallback
      获取AVIMClient当前连接状态的回调类 Created by lbt05 on 8/6/15.
      class  AVIMConversationCallback
      作为Conversation操作的回调抽象类
      class  AVIMConversationCreatedCallback 
      class  AVIMConversationMemberCountCallback
      查询在线用户数目的回调抽象类
      class  AVIMConversationQueryCallback
      从AVIMClient查询AVIMConversation时的回调抽象类
      class  AVIMMessagesQueryCallback
      消息记录查询的回调 Created by lbt05 on 2/3/15.
      class  AVIMOnlineClientsCallback
      作为AVIMClient方法中checkOnlineClients的回调方法
      class  AVIMSingleMessageQueryCallback
      针对某些明确知道只有一个消息返回的消息查询接口的回调 比如getLastMessage
